title: Screen blinking on game startup
body: I played 2 games today. 1st game was a bot game. No problem. Took a 5 minute break and played an ARAM game with friends. I had curse voice activated. It immediately started blinking at the load in screen and proceeded to blink (and dim a bit) while in game. So what is the issue that I need to fix? Graphics card? Drivers? Something else? Clue me in on how to stop it from blinking like this.

replies.body: So this is an ongoing problem for others then? I haven't even logged into the game in about a month myself.

Your issue sounds strange, and I'm thinking it might be caused by some other 3rd party program.  Are you using a program called Flux at all?  A similar issue also started happening as a result of a windows 10 update with [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html).  Disable that and see if the issue continues (through a custom games).  Let me know!

I searched my computer and there are no files for a xbox game bar, but i checked xbox one smartglass in case that was the problem and found that it isnt even active.

I also tried running the new client as administrator to see if that would work, it didnt.

Nope, not using Flux at all (only Curse voice and Firefox were open). I do not even know what the Flux program is about.

Xbox game bar may be the cause. I did recently make an update and I did notice an Xbox logo pop up a few times on my task bar. I will fiddle around with this and try it out.

But first I will update drivers and get that taken care of two. Might as well kill two birds with one stone.
definitely isnt curse related.  a friend of mine is also having this issue, as am i, and he uninstalled curse to see if that would work and he is still having the problem occur
